title: School Days: Valentine Days
synopsis:
Kotonoha Katsura and her sister, Kokoro, have invited Sekai Saionji, Makoto Itou, and their friends on a hot spring trip with one goal in mind: to take a breather from their busy school lives.

After the outing, the girls begin to discuss the upcoming Valentine's Day and their plans for the important event. When the day finally arrives, Makoto—who expected not to receive any chocolate from anyone—abruptly finds himself surrounded by a group of girls who all want to give their chocolates to him.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
